title: Daddy, Where's Your Vagina? What I Learned As a Stay-at-home Dad
description: DWYV is a parenting book written for the education and enjoyment of both dads and moms. This highly entertaining book is written from the unique perspective of a stay-at-home dad. With over nine years experience as a full-time dad, Joe Schatz has learned a lot and in DWYV he shares those experiences effectively bringing the reader on an epic and insightful journey from diapers to minivans, from rookie to experienced parent and from a guy with good intentions into a father.
author: Joseph Schatz
